author: neeraj
msg: Removed methods getDTDGrammars() and getSchemaGrammars() to make
the implementation independent any specific grammar types.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug [6776]: fields from schema PSVI items should be checked
before being used, in case the instance was not fully validated.

author: neeraj
msg: Now we defer the loading of schema specified through externalSchema and
noNamespaceExternalSchema location proerties, the specified grammar from
particular namespace is loaded only when there is reference to any component from that

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug [6766]: we didn't reset the schema handler (traversers) between parsing schema documents.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug [6716]: The test to determine if fElementChildrenOffsetStack needs to be resized was incorrect.
